name: .D88 File Extension
summary: Learn about .D88 files and view a list of programs that open them.

description: Disk image saved in the Toshiba Pasopia 7 format; can be created from a Teledisk archive (.TD0 file) using the t2d file conversion program; may be opened by eQC-10, an open-source Epson QC-10/QX-10 emulator for Windows.

content: The D88 file format is an uncompressed floppy disk image format that uses sector sizes of 128, 258, 512, or 1,024 bytes. Each sector header includes markers for track, side, sector, size, number of sectors, and density.

windows.name: Open over 400 file formats with File Viewer Plus.Free Download
